SEARCH
Package edu.rpi.legup.ui.boardview

Class ElementView

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.ui.boardview.ElementView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleshipClueView, GridElementView, MasyuLineView, SkyscrapersClueView, StarBattleBorderView, TreeTentClueView, TreeTentLineView
public abstract class ElementView extends Object implements Shape
ElementView represents a visual representation of a PuzzleElement. It handles drawing, selection, hover states, and interaction with the PuzzleElement.

    • getPathIterator

      public PathIterator getPathIterator(AffineTransform at)
      Returns an iterator over the path geometry of this ElementView. The iterator provides access to the path's segments and their coordinates, which can be used for rendering or hit testing.
      Specified by:
      getPathIterator in interface Shape
      Parameters:
      at - the AffineTransform to apply to the path geometry
      Returns:
      a PathIterator that iterates over the path geometry of this ElementView

    • getPathIterator

      public PathIterator getPathIterator(AffineTransform at, double flatness)
      Returns an iterator over the path geometry of this ElementView with the specified flatness. The iterator provides access to the path's segments and their coordinates, which can be used for rendering or hit testing.
      Specified by:
      getPathIterator in interface Shape
      Parameters:
      at - the AffineTransform to apply to the path geometry
      flatness - the maximum distance that the line segments can deviate from the true path
      Returns:
      a PathIterator that iterates over the path geometry of this ElementView
